Spell check and providing definition of correct spelled words.

= Introduction =

Utility programs, commonly referred to as just "utilities," are software programs that add functionality to your computer or help your computer perform better.

Dictionary and Spell checker is a utility program that allows a user to search a word and provide its definition. If a search word is misspelled, there are suggested words that will appear.
